Articles.Content:
Okay, so it may not be that practical and it lags like there's no tomorrow, but it still looks cool!

It comes equipped with 30 satellites for establishing multiple Communications networks around various solar bodies without need for resupply

And here it is preparing to launch satellites

If anybody's interested, here's the craft file:

http://www./download/wd6cxwzdxkmdgpd/Sat_Carrier.craft

Awesome design!

Ion drives are power hogs, but you took the bull by the horns.
It looks so good with the panels down, I kinda wish you had done it RTG-powered. Imagine the part count...

Okay, so it may not be that practical and it lags like there's no tomorrow, but it still looks cool!

KSP, in a nutshell.

Cool ship! Shame it can't use RTGs, it'd lag even more.

It looks so good with the panels down, I kinda wish you had done it RTG-powered. Imagine the part count...

I know, I was already getting close to 6 frames a second if I was lucky. It usually hung out around 4. O.O Granted, it's getting better the more satellites I drop and I have a pretty lame laptop....

Awesome design!

Ion drives are power hogs, but you took the bull by the horns.

Haha! Thanks. When in doubt, moar solar panels!
